Question
========

What is the best description of a random effect in a linear mixed model for repeated measures? 
Answerlist
----------
* An effect in which the intercept or regression coefficient may vary by person.
* An effect in which the intercept or regression coefficient does not vary by person.
* An effect in which the intercept or regression coefficient may vary by time of day.
* An effect in which the intercept or regression coefficient does not vary by time of day.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
